title: Facebook Timer
content:
With Screen Time, you can access real-time reports about how much time you spend on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch.  This way, you can make more informed decisions about how you use your devices, and set limits if you'd like to.

![](/img/posts_01-01.png)

##### Turn on Screen

* Go to Settings > Screen Time.
* Tap "Turn On Screen Time".
* Tap "Continue".
* Select This is My \[device]

You can now get a report about how you use your device, apps, and websites, any time you want.
